title: Power Quality Analysis
description: A large industrial customer is complaining that sensitive equipment is failing, and they suspect power quality issues. An engineer needs to analyze data to diagnose the problem.

tasks.description: Retrieve high-resolution waveform data from the power quality meter at the customer's service entrance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Engineer obtains detailed voltage and current waveform data.

tasks.description: Analyze the data for anomalies such as voltage sags, swells, transients, or harmonic distortion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analysis reveals multiple voltage sags and high levels of harmonic distortion.

tasks.description: Correlate the power quality events with operations on the utility grid or within the customer's facility.
tasks.expected_outcome: Engineer determines the harmonics are caused by the customer's own variable frequency drives.

tasks.description: Generate a report for the customer explaining the findings and recommending solutions, such as installing harmonic filters.
tasks.expected_outcome: Engineer provides a detailed report and actionable recommendations.
